topic.title: DMN model documentation in the IBM BAMOE DMN modeler

body.p: In the IBM BAMOE DMN modeler, you can use the Documentation tab to generate a report of your DMN model. The DMN model report contains all decision requirements diagrams (DRDs), data types, and boxed expressions in your DMN model. You can use this report to share your DMN model details or as part of your internal reporting workflow.
